name: Aquarius
description: Doxia, known as Aquarius is the goddess of wisdom, truth and knowledge. Her nearly human-sized vessel is both a source of insight and a wellspring of understanding.

skills.name: Stream's Wisdom
skills.description: Aquarius grants all allies a shield that absorbs DMG equal to 240% of ATK for 6s.

skills.name: Surge
skills.description: Aquarius locks onto the nearest enemy and then unleashes a torrent below the target, dealing 270% ATK as DMG and knocking them down.

upgrades.level3: Increases Aquarius's M-RES by 100% for 10s after casting the skill.

skills.name: Wavelet
skills.description: Aquarius applies a 6s shield to the weakest ally, absorbing DMG equal to 200% of ATK.

upgrades.level3: The shielded unit takes 20% less DMG for the next 5s.
